privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: How we collect, use, and protect your information

informationWeCollect.title: Information we collect
informationWeCollect.description: We automatically collect limited information when you visit our website. We do not collect personal information such as names, email addresses, or contact details as we do not have contact forms or user accounts:
items: Blog reading analytics (article views, reading progress, time spent on pages)
Technical information (IP address, user agent, browser type, referring website)
Website preferences (theme and language settings stored locally in your browser)

howWeUse.title: How we use your information
howWeUse.description: The information we collect is used solely to:
items: Analyze blog content performance and reader engagement
Improve website functionality and user experience
Understand general geographic distribution of our audience
Remember your theme and language preferences for future visits

dataSecurity.title: Data security
dataSecurity.description: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect information. All data is processed through Cloudflare's secure infrastructure, and we do not store personal identifying information on our servers.

cookies.title: Cookies and Local Storage
cookies.description: We use first-party cookies and local storage to enhance your experience. We do not use third-party tracking cookies or advertising cookies. You can manage these through our cookie consent banner or your browser settings.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.description: We use the following third-party services that may process data when you visit our website:
items: Cloudflare: Content delivery network, security, and server-side analytics processing (processes IP addresses, user agents, and request headers)
Google Fonts: Font delivery service (loads Inter font from Google's servers, no tracking or cookies)

yourRights.title: Your rights
yourRights.description: Since we do not collect personal identifying information, there is no personal data to access, correct, or delete. However, you can:
items: Clear your browser's local storage to remove theme and language preferences
Use privacy-focused browsers or ad blockers to limit data collection
Contact us with any privacy concerns or questions
Request information about the general analytics data we collect

contact.title: Contact us
contact.description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:
